title: Human Action Recognition
description: Preprocessor to detect human action in an image. The associated information can be found in preprocessor named 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.actionRecognition'. Up to one action is assigned to each person detected in the image by object detection preprocessor.

actions.description: Contains a list of actions detected by the preprocessor 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.actionRecognition' or empty list if no actions are found. Each action is associated with a person detected by the preprocessor 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.objectDetection' and identified by 'personID'.

personID.description: The ID of a person. The ID is generated by the preprocessor 'ca.mcgill.a11y.image.preprocessor.objectDetection' and is reused in this preprocessor

action.description: Action label: Labels are one to three words long with words separated by an underscore. Action label contains all lowercase letters and first word is a verb ending in 'ing'.

confidence.description: The confidence value obtained by applying softmax to the output tensor from the model.
